titleStmt.title: The exposition of the fyrste, seconde, and thyrde canonical epistles of S. Jhon wyth a prologe before it
Bible. N.T. Epistles of John. English. Tyndale.
titleStmt.author: Tyndale, William, d. 1536.

notesStmt.note: The commentary and prologue are by William Tyndale.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
